Title: Relates to lyme disease and tick-borne infection awareness and prevention in children's summer camps
Summary: Relates to lyme disease and tick-borne infection awareness and prevention for children's overnight, summer day and traveling summer day camps; provides guidelines for treatment and notification; provides for the development of materials.
LawCode: Add ยง1392-b, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to lyme disease and tick-borne infection awareness and prevention
